1110000101110001 0001100011100100 0 -> sum: 1111101001010101, cout: 0
1110000001111111 0000111101001010 0 -> sum: 1110111111001001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
